name: All About Demi Lovato Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
August 20th, 1992.

	Demetra Devonne Lovato was born on August 20th, 1992 in New Mexico to parents Patrick and Diana Lovato. She has an older sister called Dallas. In 1994, Patrick and Diana got divorced and Diana married Eddie de la Graza, giving Demi and Dallas a half sister called Madison. Madison is best known for her role as Juanita Solis in the tv series "Desperate Housewives".

questions.text: Demi first acted in "Barney & Friends" appearing during seasons seven and eight. What was the name of the girl she played?
questions.explanation:
Angela.

	Her best friend is Selena Gomez, who she met at the age of eight when she auditioned for "Barney & Friends". Selena played Gianna, and also appeared during seasons seven and eight. Seasons seven and eight were shot in 2002 to 2003.

questions.text: Demi has released an album called "Don't Forget" which charted on the Billboard 200. What was its peak position?
questions.explanation:
2.

	It debuted at number 2, with over 89,000 copies sold in its first week alone. It contains the single, "Get Back", "Don't Forget" and "La La Land". It was her first album. It was released on September 23rd, 2008 in the United States and Canada, just months after the film "Camp Rock" which she starred in with Joe Jonas.

questions.text: Which character does Demi play in the movie "Princess Protection Program" (2009)?
questions.explanation:
Rosie.

	When Princess Rosalinda's country is attacked by an evil intruder, she becomes a member of the "Princess Protection Program" a secret organization which protects members of the royal family. She is sent to live in Louisiana with an agent called Mason and his daughter Carter (Selena Gomez). Carter and 'Rosie' befriend each other and Carter, a tomboy, helps Rosie become a normal American girl, where Rosie teaches Carter to find her princess skills.

Devonne.

	Her full name is Demeitra Devonne Lovato.  She is a skilled pianist and a good guitar player. Demi states that her role model is Kelly Clarkson, her favorite band is Paramore and her favorite song by Paramore is 'Born To This'. She also played Charlotte Adams in the Disney channel short show, "As the Bell Rings".

questions.text: After Demi's parents divorced, to which state did Demi's father move to?
questions.explanation:
New Mexico.

	Her father's name is Patrick Lovato. Demi's mother, Diana, was formerly a Dallas Cowboys cheerleader during the 1982-83 season and a country recording artist. She got remarried to Eddie de la Garza.

questions.text: Demi guest starred in an episode of "Prison Break". Who did she play?
questions.explanation:
Danielle Curtin.

	Jessica, Ashley and Nicole are all people I made up. She starred as Danielle Curtin in the episode, "First Down". It is the fourth episode in season 2. It aired on September 11th, 2006.

questions.text: In the Disney channel movie "Camp Rock" (2008), Demi plays Mitchie, the main character. How old is Mitchie in the movie?
questions.explanation:
14.

	Mitchie Torres was a fourteen year old girl who had a dream to go to Camp Rock. At first, her parents couldn't afford it but after her mother made a deal to cook the food there, Mitchie could go. It was one of the highest watched Disney movies and the soundtrack included the hits "This is me" and "We Rock".

True.

	Demi says "I chose to leave public school. I was kind of bullied ... everyone signed a petition saying 'we all hate Demi Lovato'".

True.

	She played Nicole in the episode, "Slippery went wet". It was the sixth episode on  season two. It aired on Novmber 17th, 2007. The plot of this episode revolves around Tangie and Autumn, who read a book on how to control the universe, and Jordon uses that to get Tony out of basketball practice by making him slip on the floor, but the universe gets revenge on him.
